# Payment Service Documentation

Welcome to the Payment Service documentation.

## Overview

The Payment Service is a critical component of our e-commerce platform, handling all payment processing, refunds, and transaction management.

## Quick Links

- [Getting Started](./getting-started.md)
- [API Reference](./api-reference.md)
- [Architecture](./architecture.md)
- [Troubleshooting](./troubleshooting.md)

## Key Features

- **Multi-provider Support**: Stripe, PayPal, Square
- **PCI Compliant**: Tokenized card storage
- **Idempotent Operations**: Safe retry handling
- **Webhook Processing**: Real-time payment events

## Contact

For questions, reach out to the Platform Team:

- Slack: `#platform-payments`
- Email: payments@example.com
